--- title: Learning Rate Finder keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Implementation of the LR Range test from Leslie Smith." ---

Learning Rate Finder¶

class LRFinder[source]

LRFinder(model, stop_factor=4)

Tracks (and plots) the change in loss of a Keras model as learning rate is gradually increased. Used to visually identify a good learning rate, given model and data. Reference: Original Paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/1506.01186
